Definition at line 128 of file recordset.cc.

bdb::recordset::recordset ( table *  tbl,
const joinlist &  list 
)

Opens the recordset, which is a natural join of all recordsets, provided in the specified list.

All provided recordsets must be gained from indexes, which belong to the same table.

Exceptions:
bdb::exception BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN - unknown error.
Parameters:
[in] tbl Table with source data.
[in] list List of recordsets to join.

Definition at line 159 of file recordset.cc.

Member Function Documentation

bool bdb::recordset::fetch ( Message *  key,
Message *  data 
)

Fetches the next record from the recordset.

Exceptions:
bdb::exception BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN - unknown error.
Returns:
true - record is successfully fetched,
false - no more records to fetch.
Parameters:
[out] key Key of fetched record.
[out] data Data of fetched record.

Definition at line 249 of file recordset.cc.

void bdb::recordset::rewind (  ) 

Rewinds cursor of the recordset to the first record.

Cannot be used on joins (always throws an exception there).

Exceptions:
bdb::exception BDB_ERROR_UNKNOWN - invalid recordset.
